title: saundararAjam
sahitya:
saundararAjam AshrayE gaja brndAvanasAranga varada rAjam


anupallavi

 nanda nandana rAjam nAga paTTana rAjam sundari ramArAjam 
sura vinutam ahirAjam mandasmita mukhAmbujam mandaradhara 
karAmbujam nandakara nayanAmbujam sundaratara padAmbujam


caraNam   shambaravairi janakam sannuta shuka shaunakam ambarISAdi viditam 
anAdi guruguha muditam ambujAsanAdi nutam amarEshAdi sannutam 
ambudhi garva nigraham anrta jaDa duhkhApaham kambu viDambana kaNTham 
khaNDIkrta dashakaNTham tumburu nuta shrIkaNTham duritApaha vaikuNTham
